oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Diagnose, Therapie Und Prognose Der Darmscheibendrehung Beim Rind
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Rademacher, G.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: intestinal twisting
mesentery
cranial root
case study
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: DIAGNOSIS, THERAPY AND PROGNOSIS OF THE INTESTINAL MESENTERIC TORSION IN CATTLE Twisting of the intestinal mass around the cranial root of the mesentery occurs suddenly and the course is peracute. For the present study 100 cases seen between 1985 and October 1991 were evaluated. Article in German, English and Spanish summaries in PDF.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1992: Volume 1; 137-142
